data.message: Glassmorphism Glass Card Formula: Fill: rgba(255,255,255,0.07), backdrop-filter: blur(24px), border: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.15), border-radius: 24px. Add diagonal sheen (linear-gradient at -25°, peak 25-40% white opacity), top haze (radial gradient darkening upper card), optional brighter top border for light source direction.
